title: Power of a Mother's Prayer: The Conversion of Fr. Isaac Relyea
description:
Power of a Mother's Prayer: The Conversion of Fr. Isaac Relyea from Brooklyn [audio presentation]

Fr. Isaac Relyea shares the amazing story of his motherâ€™s persistence in prayer for his conversion, Divine protection, supernatural grace, and the Lordâ€™s incredible mercy. He heard the call to the priesthood at an early age but was pulled away by the enticements of the world, had a change of heart, and became consumed with sinful pleasures. This story shows a striking similarity to the story of St. Augustine and his mother, St. Monica.

Length: 53:19
